name: FlyJet Aviation Academy
about: FlyJet Access Flight Training is a premier aviation institution dedicated to providing world-class flight training. With a focus on nurturing passion and potential, our certified instructors utilize modern, technically advanced aircraft, including the Cirrus SR20, Piper Seminole, and Cessna 172. We offer a full range of pilot training courses, from Private Pilot to Commercial Pilot and Certified Flight Instructor programs. Our accelerated and pay-as-you-go programs cater to both career aspirations and recreational flying. Graduates are eligible for preferential hiring as flight instructors and participation in our Career Corporate Pilot Flowthrough Program. We are committed to helping students reach their full potential and preparing them for a successful career in aviation. Contact us to learn more about our comprehensive training programs.
